mapper.insert: insert into tbl_pa_blacklist_detail(phone, bankLostContact, orgLostContact, orgOverduePeriod, seriousOverdueTime, bankOverduePeriod, orgLitigation, bankLitigation, duntelCallTime, orgOneMonthOvedue, orgBlackNum) values(#{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankLostContact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgLostContact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgOverduePeriod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seriousOverdueTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankOverduePeriod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgLitigation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankLitigation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duntelCallTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgOneMonthOvedue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgBlackNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
